```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(highcharter)
library(radarchart)
library(yaml)
library(shiny)
library(purrr)
library(glue)
library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)

source("R/film-review-utils.R")
       
# Load Edition YAML
yaml = yaml.load_file("yaml/edition-17.yaml")

# Edition
ed = yaml$edition
```

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
yaml %>%
pluck("reviews") %>%
keep(~!is.null(.$reviewer)) %>%
map(compile_review, edition = ed) %>% 
tagList()
```
